__e: You had a force field with Wyatt but not with me?
No sign of your buddy, Dr. Wyatt, and we're almost out of time.
She saw me with Wyatt, and I don't know, she thinks we're together.
Lisa Wyatt is a nice woman, but I am not interested in her that way.
But Ben Wyatt is better than all of you because he cared about this town, and he tried to help it.
Don't do that, Wyatt, that's what they want.
Wyatt, if you could blow big money on one thing-- not sock money-- what would it be?
Wyatt, if you ever were my friend, if you ever had even the slightest feeling' for me, leave now.
Why'd you wait till I left to take off, Wyatt, if you think it's the right thing?
What did you do with Emily Wyatt's body?
Wyatt, can't you see that you must first strip off the uniform you wear and then your flesh before you can escape the case at issue here?
You have to tell us where Wyatt is right now.
I'm going to figure out if Wyatt is behind this once and for all.
Wyatt is very excited to spend the afternoon with you.
